(Crow Lord, please post for my previous post)


Koga Shuko/Sixshot/Unitron/Anubis/Hades/Serpentor:



Koga Shuko saw Rhinox aim, and rolled to the left 8 feet, getting to his feet 
quickly, the two rockets from Rhinox and Oinker missing.  Taking a step back, 
he fired three optic blasts at Oinker's pelvis, a rocket at Rhinox's abdomen.

---

Sixshot awoke, the continous attacks of the petty peace loving Maximals 
attacking a robot that was unconsciouss.  Taking out his rifle as his chest 
got cut up, he shoved his laser rifle 1 inch from Zergling's sternum, firing 
off two blasts at near point blank range.

---

Unitron raised his rifles, firing four laser bolts from each, four heading 
for Oinker, the other four for Sniper.

---

Serpentor raised his plasma rifle, firing a rocket from his launcher off at 
Sniper's left side, firing two plasma bolts.  One of the bolts missed, the 
other blew off DeathStorm's head off of Scattershot's.
